H0.text: Which sitcom star appeared on the big screening The Object of My Affection. Lisa Kudrow

H1.text: Which sitcom star appeared on the big screening The Object of My Affection. Courteney Cox

H2.text: Which sitcom star appeared on the big screening The Object of My Affection. Christina Applegate

H3.text: Which sitcom star appeared on the big screening The Object of My Affection. Jen Aniston

A4.text: In 1998, she appeared as a woman who falls for a gay man (played by Paul Rudd) in the romantic comedy The Object of My Affection.
